DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate combination chemotherapy gemcitabine , irinotecan panitumumab patient advance biliary cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Study Gemcitabine , Irinotecan Panitumumab Patients With Advanced Metastatic Biliary Tract Adenocarcinoma
